string-array.name: pstone
string-array.item: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live

To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure
\"The truth.\" Dumbledore sighed. \"It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution\"

What happened down in the dungeons between you and Professor Quirell is a complete secret, so, naturally, the whole school knows.
I hope you\'re pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed - or worse, expelled. Now if you don\'t mind, I\'m going to bed.
\"Ah,music,\" he said, wiping his eyes. \"A magic beyond all we do here!\"
There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.
Swish and flick.
Alas!Earwax!

"Don't play," said Hermione at once. 
"Say you're ill," said Ron. 
"Pretend to break your leg," Hermione suggested. 
"Really break your leg," said Ron.
I can teach you how to bottle fame, brew glory, even put a stopper on death.
You\'re a wizard, Harry.

string-array.name: cosecrets
string-array.item: It is our choices,Harry,that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Oh well....I\'d just been thinking, if you had died,you\'d have been welcome to share my toilet.
Of all the trees that we could\'ve hit, we had to get one that hits back.
I\'ll be in my bedroom,making no noise and pretending I\'m not there.
You will find that I will only truly have left this school when none here are loyal to me.
Lockhart\'ll sign anything if it stands still long enough.
What exactly is the function of a rubber duck?

item.i: Oh,Potter,you rotter,oh, what have you done,\n You\'re killing off students, you think it\'s good fun-

string-array.item: \"Famous Harry Potter,\" said Malfoy. \"Can\'t even go to a bookshop without making the front page\"
You will also find that help will always given at hogwarts to those who ask for it.

string-array.name: poazkaban
string-array.item: I solemnly swear that i am up to no good.
I don\'t go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.
Don\'t let the muggles get you down.
\"I dreamed that I was buying new shoes last night,\" said Ron. \"What d\'ya think that\'s gonna mean?\"\n \"Probably that you\'re going to be eaten by a giant marshmallow or something,\" said Harry.
I want to commit the murder I was imprisoned for.
Are you insane? Of course I want to leave the Dursleys! Have you got a house?When can I move in?
Mischief Managed.
The consequences of our actions are always so complicated,so diverse,that predicting the future is a very difficult business indeed.
Turn to page three hundred and ninety-four.

string-array.name: gofire
string-array.item: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
Percy wouldn\'t notice a joke if it danced naked in front of him wearing one of Dobby\'s hats.
\"Don\'t talk to me.\"\n\"Why not?\"\n\"Because I want to fix that in my memory for ever. Draco Malfoy, the amazing bouncing ferret...\"
Just because it\'s taken you three years to notice,Ron, doesn\'t mean no one else has spotted I\'m a girl!
Constant Vigilance!
I thought it sounded a bit like Percy singing...maybe you\'ve got to attack him while he\'s in the shower, Harry.
I sometimes find, and I am sure you know the feeling, that I simply have too many thoughts and memories crammed into my mind.

Dark times lie ahead of us and there will be a time when we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
\"There you go Harry!\" Ron shouted over the noise.\"You weren\'t being thick after all-you were showing moral fiber!\"

string-array.name: oophoenix
string-array.item: Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn\'t mean we all have.
Wit beyond measure is man\'s greatest treasure

Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
Don\'t put your wand there, boy!...Better wizards than you have lost buttocks, you know!

According to Madam Pomfrey, thoughts could leave deeper scars than almost anything else.
Don\'t worry, You\'re just as sane as I am.

string-array.name: hbprince
string-array.item: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure.
Dumbledore says people find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than for being right.
When you have seen as much of life as I have, you will not underestimate the power of obsessive love.
Killing is not so easy as the innocent believe.
Well, you seemed far too busy to call him a prat and I thought someone should.
Age is foolish and forgetful when it underestimates youth.
P.S. I enjoy acid pops.
Greatness inspires envy, envy engenders spite, spite spawns lies.
Killing rips the soul apart.
Because to confide a part of your soul to something that can think and move for itself is obviously a very risky business.

string-array.name: dhallows
string-array.item: Of course it\'s happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should it mean that it is not real?
Do not pity the dead,Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love.
He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo.
Not my daughter, you bitch!

We did it, we bashed them wee Potter\'s the one, and Voldy\'s gone moldy, so now let\'s have fun!
